## OpenAPI.AnimationUtils.setAnimation() method

设置动画

**Signature:**

```typescript

```

## Example


```ts
const object = new GameSprite()
OpenAPI.AnimationUtils.setAnimation(object, 1, Callback.New(() => {
   console.log('动画播放完成')
}, this))
```
